sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:30:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Dip a spring roll wrapper into warm water until softened. 2. Lay the wrapper flat on a clean surface. 3. Place a lettuce leaf on the bottom half of the wrapper. 4. Top with cooked rice vermicelli noodles, julienned carrots, julienned cucumber, shrimp, mint leaves, cilantro, and Thai basil leaves. 5. Fold the bottom of the wrapper over the filling. Fold in the sides and roll tightly. 6. Repeat with remaining ingredients. 7. Serve Thai spring rolls with peanut sauce for dipping.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients/> <meal_type display_value="Appetizer">91508fd39755021069a3b6fce053af8b</meal_type> <name>Thai Spring Rolls</name> <nutrition>Calories: 200, Protein: 15g, Fat: 5g, Carbs: 30g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Peel and devein shrimp. 2. Cook rice vermicelli noodles. 3. Julienne carrots and cucumber.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:56:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ce5917d797d5021069a3b6fce053afde</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:11</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
